subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Guillermo Mota, who signed a two-year deal on Thursday to stay with the Mets, is one of 15 major leaguers over the past two years to be suspended for violating the ban on performance-enhancing drugs.
snippet: Guillermo Mota, who signed a two-year deal on Thursday to stay with the Mets, is one of 15 major leaguers over the past two years to be suspended for violating the ban on performance-enhancing drugs.
